Package org.example.GUI.mainGame

Class Game

java.lang.Object
org.example.GUI.mainGame.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Game extends Object implements Runnable
The main game class that initializes and manages the game components and logic. Implements the Runnable interface for multi-threading.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game() throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, LineUnavailableException, IOException
      Constructs a Game object and initializes game components.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - If an unsupported audio file is encountered.
      LineUnavailableException - If a line cannot be opened because it is unavailable.
      IOException - If an I/O operation fails or is interrupted.
